lemonbade: The crypt in the Cathedral. The Pound bar in the Westgate. The Falstaff Hotel. All Saints Lane. Turn Again Lane. The river by the Millers Arms. Augustine's Abbey. The interior of Augustine House. The Priory and St Martins church. All parts of The Kings School. The river tours. Abode Hotel and it's lovely upstairs lounge. The Canterbury Tales attraction. Canterbury Castle. The amazing roman mosaic in the Roman museum. Follow Whitehall road round and get some amazing tunnels. Upstairs in cafe Nero. Downstairs in Costa has an old font. The cathedral grounds. Walk through from the crypt to the outside and through the kings school and out of the mint yard gate in the borough. 💜
gibrangaleb1974: Amazing Kopal, you did it again !
